author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Principal of Namakkal Kavignar Ramalingam Government Arts College for Women has lodged a complaint with police that an Assistant Professor had submitted fake Ph.D. certificate and joined the college.

In her complaint to the Namakkal police, Principal M. Jayanthi Violet said that E. Josephine Kamelia (38), a native of Coonoor, had joined the college in the Department of Botany in 2011. Her Ph.D certificate showed that she completed it from a university in Bihar. Recently, after the fake certificate racket came up, certificates of all faculties were scrutinised. Her certificate was sent to the university concerned in Bihar for verifying it’s genuine. The university replied that it was fake. The principal said that the faculty concerned is not attending the college and they were unable to establish contact with her. The police are on the look out for the teacher.
title: Complaint filed against college teacher
